text: Step Brothers is a 2008 American comedy movie directed by Adam McKay, produced by Judd Apatow and Jimmy Miller, and stars Will Ferrell and John C. Reilly. It was released in movie theaters on July 25, 2008, and released on DVD and Blu- ray on December 2, 2008. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:2008 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about marriage Category:Movies directed by Adam McKay Category:Multilingual movies
title: Step Brothers (movie)
